named-query.name: getPatternsForBrand
named-query.query: select pattern from Pattern pattern where pattern.brand.id = :brandId

named-query.name: getProductsForPatterns
named-query.query: select product from Product product join product.productSpec productSpec join productSpec.pattern pattern where pattern.id = :patternId

named-query.name: getProductsByDimensions
named-query.query: select product from Product product join product.productSpec productSpec join productSpec.dimensions dimensions where dimensions.dimensionProperty.name = 'Width' and dimensions.dimensionValue = '45' and exists ( select product1 from Product product1 join product1.productSpec productSpec1 join productSpec1.dimensions dimensions1 where dimensions1.dimensionProperty.name = 'Height' and dimensions1.dimensionValue = '35' and product = product1 )

named-query.name: getProduct
named-query.query: select product from Product product join fetch product.brand brand join fetch product.productSpec productSpec join fetch productSpec.pattern pattern where product.id = :productId

named-query.name: getProductSpecWithTechSpecs
named-query.query: select distinct productSpec from ProductSpec productSpec join fetch productSpec.techSpecs techSpecs where productSpec.id = :productSpecId

named-query.name: getProductSpecWithDimensions
named-query.query: select distinct productSpec from ProductSpec productSpec join fetch productSpec.dimensions dimensions where productSpec.id = :productSpecId

named-query.name: getTechSpecPropertyInitialized
named-query.query: select techSpecProperty from TechSpecProperty techSpecProperty join fetch techSpecProperty.category category where techSpecProperty.id = :techSpecPropertyId

named-query.name: getDimensionPropertyInitialized
named-query.query: select dimensionProperty from DimensionProperty dimensionProperty join fetch dimensionProperty.category category where dimensionProperty.id = :dimensionPropertyId
